showroom.address: UEM Sunrise Showcase 21, Jalan Kiara, Mont’Kiara, 50480 Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
showroom.operating_hours: Weekdays: 9.30am to 5.30pm Weekends and Public Holidays: 10.00am to 5.00pm

description: Residensi22 offers large sky suites permeated with sunlight and communal spaces immersed in nature, right in Mont’Kiara. A variety of layouts, ranging from 1,878 to 2,043 sqft., will suit a range of personal preferences, and with only four units to a floor, a life of privacy and exclusivity is found here.
features: Gated And Guarded Card Access System With AV Intercoms, CCTVs And Security Guard Patrols
Stunning Sky Decks With Lounges And Entertainment Areas
Function Galleries – Small To Big Events
